nodes.label: Data modeling
nodes.title: Data modeling: Data modeling is the process of defining the structure of a database to represent the data and its relationships in a meaningful way.

nodes.label: Relational data models
nodes.title: Relational data models: Relational data models organize data into tables (relations) consisting of rows (tuples) and columns (attributes).

nodes.label: Query Construction
nodes.title: Query Construction: Query construction involves formulating requests to retrieve, manipulate, or analyze data from a database.

nodes.label: SQL
nodes.title: SQL: SQL (Structured Query Language) is a standard language used for interacting with relational databases.

nodes.label: Website data model and Relational data model
nodes.title: Website data model and Relational data model:

nodes.label: Database: Building and using, MySQL
nodes.title: Database: Building and using, MySQL: MySQL: A popular open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) that uses SQL for database management.
